history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: Riemann_integrable_scal. hauto use: Rmult_comm, Rabs_Rabsolu, Rabs_Rinv, Rabs_mult unfold: Rdiv. qsimpl time: 1 use: Riemann_integrable_scal.

exceptions.tactic: intros f a b c H.

exceptions.exn: In environment a, b : R H : b <> 0 Unable to unify "forall eps : posreal, {phi : StepFun ?M2284 ?M2285 & {psi : StepFun ?M2284 ?M2285 | (forall t : R, Rmin ?M2284 ?M2285 <= t <= Rmax ?M2284 ?M2285 -> Rabs ((fun x : R => ?M2286 * ?M2283 x) t - phi t) <= psi t) /\\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < eps}}" with "Rabs (a / b) = Rabs a / Rabs b".

In environment X : forall (f : R -> R) (a b k : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => k * f x) a b a, b : R H : b = 0 -> False Unable to unify "False" with "Rabs (a / b) = Rabs a / Rabs b".

original: intros f a b c H. apply Riemann_integrable_scal. apply H.
